0.title: Salut Pública
0.content: Salut pública i nutrició comunitària . Kevin Lin he/him . kevinl@cs.uw.edu . Schedule a meeting . In this seminar series, we will engage in the emergent dialogue on critical computing theory by analyzing the politics of computing—the consequences, limitations, and unjust impacts of computing in society. What might a future history of computing look like if computing worked in favor of collective human liberation rather than as Weapons of Math Destruction? . 10 feb La salut i els seus determinants Joe Brew . | Diapositives | Lectura | Activitat | . 10 feb Unpacking Equity Kamau Bobb . | Can Learning Be Fair? | The racial politics of STEM education in the USA: interrogations and explorations | ‘Losing an arm’: schooling as a site of black suffering | VOICES: Covid-19’s Impact on Schools & Implicit Bias | UW removes standardized testing requirement for incoming students | .
